column15: Buy original Longines Watch at best price in India. Read its features  reviews and specifications. Get fast & assured delivery all over India.
column17:
Longines Men Black Analog Watch:
Coming from the celebrated luxury brand Longines this exquisite watch will speak of your exclusive and rich taste in fashion. This watch comes with a buckled black leather strap that features a reptile skin pattern. The white dial of this watch has classic Roman numerals that tell time in an analog format. A date wheel adds to the utility-factor of this timepiece. Team up this watch from Longines with a classy black suit and look dapper.
